about_the_game:
Take your place among heroes

Get immediate access to all the following features:
  • Get access to the Online Co-Op mode!
  • Immediately Unlock All Online Operators & Aliens! (GET ACCESS TO ALL CHARACTERS!)
  • Unlocks All Online Game Modes
  • Receive A Permanent 20% Experience Boost
  • Unlocks All Online/Multiplayer Maps (Includes DLC-Exclusives)

The fight for freedom never slows, never loses faith, and never gives up.

name: Deep Space Classic - Admiral's Edition

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Deep Space Classic - Admiral's Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: In this cold universe, the light of Spacefleet is seen as a beacon of hope for planets near and far as aliens ravage through the universe. It's up to you, a Spacefleet officer to dispatch and bring order back to the United Alliance of Planets!
